name: js.swipelist
body:
### Demo http://github.com - automatic! [GitHub](http://github.com) ### Configuration ```javascript var options = { styleCallback:function(entry,element){ element.text(entry.index); }, selectCallback:function(entry){}, index:1 }; ``` ### Content ```javascript var entries = [{"index":0},{"index":1},{"index":2},{"index":3}]; //can be any kind of array ``` ### HTML ```html
``` ### Initialization ```javascript var mySwipeList = new SwipeList(); mySwipeList.init(entries,$("#list"),options); ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
